descriptions:
['DescriptionFirst Gulf Platinum Properties Real Estate Broker Irani Udowita proudly present this type C3 - 4 bedrooms residential villa in Victory Heights to the market for sale. This beautiful family home located in popular Esmeralda village and is in excellent condition.
Property Features:
* 4 Bedroom + Maids room
* Open kitchen with appliances
* Dining area
* Large reception room
* Spacious outdoor area 
* 2 car parking
* BUA: 3,201 sqft
* Backing greenery
* Immaculate condition 
* Quiet location
* Vacant
It is an amazing 4-bedroom family home should be viewed to fully appreciate all it has to offer. The property is in very good condition and outside is the right place for family entertainment & leisure. The location of this villa is also close to the community pool and gym.
Ground floor opens to living and dining area, a second reception area and an open plan kitchen. There is also a guest bedroom on the ground floor with an en-suite. 
The first floor opens three double bedrooms, one with an en suite and the other two sharing a family bathroom. All the upstairs bedrooms also benefit from extra fitted wardrobes.
Victory Heights is a popular gated community built around the Ernie Els-designed golf course. The community is largely made up of lots of green open space with parks in most of the villages for residents to enjoy. 
There are over 4 entrances and exits that lead to the three major road networks of Al Khail, Hessa Street and Sheikh Mohammad Bin Zayed Road so access in and out of the community is easy.']

The first floor hosts four further generously sized bedroom suites. The Master Bedroom features a walk-in wardrobe and an en-suite bathroom with his and hers vanity units. There is also a first-floor living area adjacent to the 2 front-facing bedrooms.

Enter the villa through a courtyard which leads into a light, spacious hallway which leads to the formal lounge. French doors open directly to the garden and to the adjacent summer room. The family room, which also opens to the rear garden opens into a Poggenpohl designer kitchen, complete with fully installed Miele appliances.
The landscaped gardens, swimming pool and BBQ area offer an ideal family entertaining area with spectacular views down the fairways of the course.
The first floor hosts four generously sized bedroom suites. The Master Bedroom features a large sitting area which opens onto a terrace, a walk in wardrobe and a beautiful en-suite bathroom with his and hers vanity units.

["DescriptionBoasting some of the region's most attractive landscapes and amenities, Yas Acres puts community at its heart, providing you with solid ground to lay down roots and build memories. Yas Acres embraces a love of leisure and provides you with a world of possibilities to explore and experience at your pace. Whether it is on the golf course, at the mall, by the pool or simply at home with family, Yas Acres offers you the space to nurture the lifestyle of your choice and cherish the moments that matter the most to you.
It is a multipurpose hub for entertainment, shopping and tourism, connected to the mainland through a comprehensively linked road network.It is already home to the Yas Marina Circuit, which hosts the Abu Dhabi Formula 1 Grand Prix each year. It boasts major retail in the form of Yas Mall and IKEA. Two theme parks are in operation - Yas Waterworld and Ferrari World - with more marked out for development in the future. descriptions: ["DescriptionD&B Properties are delighted to offer for sale this 2 bedroom apartment located in the inspiring Address Residences, Jumeirah,\xa0The Address Jumeirah will be undoubtedly one of Dubai's most iconic real estate projects, it has some of the most astounding views in Dubai featuring the new Wheel and the palm Jumierah. The building will have 16 restaurants in house. There will be an incredible rooftop infinity pool and rooftop bar. The hotel will be operated by the Address hospitality group. Unlike many adverts online, all the prices i am listing are correct.\xa0For full information on this project please give me a call.\xa0* Selling Price: AED\xa02,680,000* Flexible payment plan*\xa0Views of Bluewaters, Palm, Marina and Burj Al Arab* Built Up Area: 1,152 Square Feet* Ready to move in by 2020* 25 minutes to Burj Khalifa and Sheikh Zayed Road* 2 bedroom with en-suite bathrooms*\xa0The first Address Hotel on the Beach in Dubai* Soothing serenity with direct access to beach and open air swimming poolAt the Address Residences Jumeirah Resort + Spa, visitors and residents can enjoy the wide range of world-class luxurious amenities, featuring international dining, serene spa facilities and extravangant rooftop infinity pool offering unrivalled 360 views of Dubai skyline, Arabian Gulf, Dubai Marina, Ain Dubai and newly announced Dubai Harbour.Call George our expert for more info or to organise a full project tour\xa0+971565055047 |\xa0800 DANDB | www.dandbdubai.com D&B Properties is a leading real estate company in the International Off-Plan market incl London, Dubai & Abu Dhabi."]

title_advert: ['Semi Detached Type A Townhouse | Bella Casa']
amenities: ['Unfurnished\nConcierge']
descriptions:
["DescriptionAQUA Properties is proud to offer this amazing 3-bedroom corner unit in Bella Casa, Serena. This semi-detached townhouse features a Spanish-style design including tiled roofs, elegant detailing, spacious layouts with a great balance of elegance and practicality. Accommodating the needs of all families, this sought-after property is offered ar an affordable price. 
* Type A corner unit
* 3 Bedrooms
* Maid's room
* BUA: 2,566.3 sq.ft.
* Plot: 3,040 sq.ft.
* 4 Bathrooms
* Open kitchen
* Close to Exit  
* Near the pool and the park
Amenities and facilities:
* CCTV monitored community
* 24/7 security
* Community swimming pool
* Jogging and walking track
* Parks and BBQ areas available
* Closer to schools
* Pets Allowed
* Supermarket, restaurants and cafe
Community location:
* 15-minute drive from Dubai Al Maktoum Airport
* 15-minute drive from EXPO Site
* 20-minute drive from Mall of the Emirates
* 30-minute drive from Dubai Mall/Downtown Dubai
Serena is located in Dubailand providing easy access to schools, shopping centres and sports facilities. The community is a dynamic community set near Emirates Road offering quality."]
